name: Ethan Stone
details: Hi! My name is Ethan and I’m a third year computer science major who’s had experience tutoring since Highschool. I’m also a trumpet playing member of the Cal Band, and work as a campus ambassador. In my free time I love to play board games and watch (maybe too much) YouTube. Go bears!

name: Anaisha Das
details: Hi! I'm Anaisha and I like matcha, city-exploring, music, and CS education. Excited to make content this semester :)

name: Ava Rouzmehr
details: Hi all! I'm Ava and I'm a freshman from the Bay Area studying EECS with a potential double major in BioE! In my free time, I like to draw cursed art of my friends, make beaded silver jewelry, and play video games (I am a risk of rain FIEND). I'm super hyped to be working with everyone this semester !! :)

name: Bryan Ventura
details: I'm Bryan Ventura, a CS junior transferring from LA but born in El Salvador. I am an active advocate for social justice and DEI (diversity, equity, and inclusion). In my free time, I love listening to music, attending concerts, cooking, working out, and adding plants 🪴 to my place. A fun fact: my musical taste is a bit all over the place, but lately, I've been listening to SZA, Kali Uchis, and Rauw Alejandro a lot. I'm very open to music recommendations. I can't wait to meet you all - feel free to reach out (: !

name: Smrithi Senthilnathan
details: Hi! I'm Smrithi and I'm a freshman from Mountain House, CA intending to double major in Media Studies and Data Science. In my free time I enjoy reading, writing, learning new songs on the piano, and playing with my dog. My favorite song right now is "painkiller" by blackbear, and my favorite artists are Olivia Rodrigo and Gravie Abrams. On campus, I'm also a part of Political Computer Science and CalTV! I'm so excited to be a part of CS Mentors this semester <3

name: Tavisha Patel
details: Hi! I'm Tavisha, and I am a freshman studying EECS! This is my first semester at CSM, and I took CS61A last semester. In my free time, I like to read, play the piano, and play New York Times games. I'm looking forward to this semester!

name: Alyssa Li
details: Hi! My name is Alyssa, and I'm a first year studying data science. In my free time, I like to draw, play puzzle games, and listen to music. Excited to meet you all!

name: Amanda Zhang
details: Hey, I'm Amanda! I'm a freshman studying EECS and I took 61A last sem! Most of my coding experience comes from robotics (FIRST anyone?). I'm a member of Cal Climbing and CHAOS right now, and I love the 1975, making/watching YouTube videos, eating yummy food, and I’m down to explore anything anytime!

name: Angie Wang
details: Hi! I'm Angie, I'm a first-year studying Data Science and I'm from the bay area. I love baking, going on hikes, and exploring new food places! You'll often catch me with an overpriced matcha. I'm super excited to be teaching 61A for CSM this semester and looking forward to meeting you guys!!

name: Aryan Shah
details:
Sure! Here’s a refined version of your bio within the 300-character limit:  

*
Hi, I'm Aryan, a Data Science sophomore at Cal from San Diego. I played high level club soccer, love staying active, and am into house music—currently learning to DJ. This summer, I'm a intern at GE. I enjoy helping students beyond coursework, giving tips, and sharing my experiences!

name: Christopher Park
details:
Hi all! I'm a freshman studying CS, with interests in ML. My hobbies include running, cooking, and yapping. I've recently fallen in love with R&B lol so shout out SZA! Also currently training for a triathlon. I'm also big backed so pls pls give me restaurant recs

Super excited to meet everyone :)

name: Ethelyn
details: Hi! I'm Ethelyn, currently majoring in EECS and Business. I love great views, terrible puns, playing music, and scoping out dining.berkeley.edu. On a typical day, you can find me at panda express <3

name: Frida Arriaga
details: Hi, I'm Frida :D I'm a first year studying CS and I'm from Coachella, CA. I’m also a part of ANova! I enjoy running and watching kdramas on Netflix in my free time. I’m so excited to be a JM for cs61A this semester! Feel free to reach out at frida.arriaga@berkeley.edu

name: Hershraj Niranjani
details: Hiya! I'm Hershraj, a second-year studying EECS. I love just about all things math/eecs/physics related. Outside of academics, I love climbing, board games, experimental hip-hop, and yapping.

name: Hridayaa Hariani
details: Hello! CS61A was my first exposure to coding. Though it might seem daunting, I want to help everyone excel in this class. I enjoy baking, travelling, exploring new restaurants and watching movies.

name: Jaansi Parsa
details: hii, i'm jaansi, a freshman studying EECS & business! apart from teaching, i love chocolate chip cookies, all things nature, and my 450+ day duolingo streak. so so excited to get to know you all!

name: Jyrel Mendoza
details: Hey!! I'm Jyrel, a 1st year student studying CS. Excited to be helping out at CSM with 61A (loved the class so much!!). If I'm not busy, I love playing basketball and thinking of serious answers to the dumbest questions ever. Can't wait to get to know all of you!!

name: Lavanya Shyamsundar
details: Hi everyone! My name is Lavanya and I'm a freshman studying EECS. In my free time I love trying new food places, watching anime, reading webtoons, and listening to music. Can't wait to meet everyone, and I'm super excited :)!!

name: Manav Aggarwal
details: Hi everyone! I'm Manav, and I'm a freshman studying EECS. I grew up in the South and have loved my time in the Bay so far :). In my free time, I like to go to the gym and cook. I love to eat, so give me cafe/restaurant recs! Hope to meet you soon!

name: Naisha Jain
details: Hey! I'm Naisha and I'm a freshman studying EECS & Business from Dallas, TX. In my free time, I love to read, crochet, dance, grab treats from Sharetea and Chipotle, and listen to music! I really enjoyed taking this course last semester, and I can't wait to meet you soon!

name: Zixian Li
details: Hi! I am Zixian(Amy), a freshman from Beijing. I’m still exploring major/minor options & am open to course recs! In my free time I enjoy dancing, going to vintage shops, and staring into empty space.

name: Ethan Gale
details: Hi, I’m Ethan! I’m in my second year studying EECS. I like to run and lift but in a chill way. On campus, you can always find me in VLSB vibing to music rather than locking in. I am currently in my crossword puzzle and classical music era, but I am very open to music recommendations. Cheers! :D

name: Lenci Ni
details: Hi! I'm Lenci, a junior from Seattle studying EECS. This will be my third semester as an SM for 61a. I really enjoyed taking this course and I'm excited for this semester — feel free to reach out :D

name: Ryan Tom
details: Hi everyone! I’m Ryan, a 2nd year EECS major who enjoys playing basketball, raving, escape rooms, rating coffee, and trying new foods! Very excited to meet you all :)

name: Alex Chang
details: hello :) i'm alex and i'm a sophomore studying data science and computer science. i love sports, cooking, and music (especially cello). i also consume alarming amounts of food.

name: Devansh Ojha
details: Waddup! I'm Devansh, a sophomore from Los Angeles studying EECS. In my free time, I enjoy hitting the gym, playing soccer, listening to music, meditating, napping, and cooking new recipes. CS61B was a fun experience for me, and I hope to make it the same for you!!

name: Frank Shang
details: Hello! I'm Frank and a Concurrent Enrollment student here at Berkeley (I'm also finishing up my degree in Computer Engineering @ NYU). This will be my second time mentoring for 61B and I absolutely love teaching CS. Super excited to meet you and to be along your 61B journey!

name: Ivy Liu
details: Hello, I'm Ivy! This is my 3rd semester teaching for CSM 61B and I can't wait to meet you.

name: Anirudh Suresh
details: Hi! I’m a junior majoring in CS and Economics. This is my fourth semester in CSM and my third semester as a content mentor. I enjoy board games, crosswords and reading in my free time. Looking forward to a great semester!

name: John Bragado
details: Howdy! I'm John, a sophomore from SoCal studying Data Science and physics. I love volleyball, art & graphics, listening to music, and rewatching pitch perfect. CS 61B was my favorite class so far and I'm looking forward to teaching it this semester !! :D

name: Yuki Chen
details: Hi! I'm Yuki and I'm currently a second-year student major in Data Science and Cognitive Science. This is my second semester in CSM and I'm super excited about creating content and teaching! I love exploring new restaurants, listening to r&b music and watching anime. I'm also big k-pop fan and love to cover k-pop dances. Feel free to reach out to me for anything: )

name: Akansha Jain
details: hi

name: Alex Wang
details: Hi! My name is Alex and I'm a second-year CS major from the bay area. Outside of class, I like drumming/playing music, and learning how to cook better. 61B is my favorite course and I'm excited for a great semester! Looking forward to meeting everyone!

name: Audrey Zhu
details: Hi! I’m Audrey, a sophomore studying data science. This will be my second semester teaching with CSM! I like to spend my free time playing pickleball, watching Netflix, and eating! One of my favorite restaurants around is Muracci’s Curry! I’m super excited to get to know you!

name: Bhavita Peddi
details: Hey! I'm Bhavita and I'm a second-year studying EECS from the Bay! I love art, exploring, and I'm also big matcha enthusiast! I really enjoyed taking 61B and look forward to teaching. So excited to meet you :)

name: Frederick Dehmel
details: Hi, my name is Fredi! I took CS 61B during the fall of 2024 and I am excited to work with you all this semester! I am from London and I am a sophomore studying Environmental Economics & Policy. I love to read, thrift and play basketball, and my favourite place to eat in Berkeley is Top Dog!

name: Jason Tang
details: Hello, I'm Jason—I'm a sophomore EECS '27 student from LA, and I'm excited to be your mentor! I really enjoy teaching and being able to share my knowledge with others, so I hope we can be part of this journey together. In my free time, I enjoy listening to music, hiking, and traveling, and my favorite artist is wave to earth!

name: Jeffrey Gong
details: Hi! I'm Jeffrey a second year from socal studying eecs + business. I enjoy playing badminton, chess, looking at planes and taking advantage of restaurant reward systems. I'm also involved in venture and the business community as well! looking forward to meeting you all :)

name: Juhi Jadav
details: hi! i'm juhi and i'm a sophomore studying data science. outside of school, i love to dance, read, nap, and hunt for new matcha places :) looking forward to a great semester!

name: Julia Liu
details: Hi! I'm a sophomore studying Art Practice. I like to do anything art related (drawing, painting, digital art). I took CS61B Fall 2024 and really enjoyed it! Outside of classes, I play the Pipa (chinese lute), design cool logos, and do some tattooing!

name: Kelly Ha
details: Hi everyone! My name is Kelly, and I'm super excited to teach 61B. I'm a second-year double majoring in Data Science and Applied Mathematics. I like to play pickleball, hike, and try new food. I like to listen to the Marias and Cigarettes After Sex. Feel free to reach out!

name: Lara Chieppe
details: Hi! I’m Lara, a sophomore studying BioE from Brazil. In my free time, I enjoy learning new languages, running, and reading the most random and interesting books I can find. I’m very excited to have a great semester! Feel free to reach out about anything :)

name: Liwen Sun
details: Hi I'm Liwen. I am a senior at UC Berkeley studying CS. I love to listen to Kpop, my favorite artists are Blackpink and Babymonster.

name: Melanie Liu
details: Hi everyone, I'm Melanie and I’m currently a sophomore studying EECS. This is my second semester on CSM and I love crocheting, getting food, baking, skiing and hanging out with friends!

name: Mihika Balaji
details: Hey! I'm a junior majoring in CS+CogSci. Aside from an interest in database engineering, I'm an avid explorer of the horror genre and enthusiastic taster of coffees. I am also a part of Kappa Alpha Theta, ASUC Admin Office, and ML research at the Dept. of Political Science. Excited to be mentoring!

name: Nada Hameed
details: Hi! My name is Nada, a second-year from NYC studying math and/or cs. I like bouldering, reading, and I’m trying to learn the guitar. I want to get my motorcycle license (I have failed my road test three times), and go to outer space. I like Yogurt Park because I’m a sucker for sweets. On campus, I’m also involved in MDB and MTC. Before I graduate, I want to get my kayaking certification, take an art class, and play the bells on the Campanile.

name: Octavio Lomeli-Castro
details: Hi! I'm a junior studying CS and this is my second semester with CSM. Outside of courses, I enjoy CS research, teaching, leetcoding, horror movies, and playing SSBU. I love helping people, so always feel free to reach out about the major or for general advice!

name: Quincy Thai
details: Yo!!!11 I'm Quincy, a transfer and first gen college student from the Bay (Hayward) studying CS. 61B was my first and favorite coding class at Berkeley. I love powerlifting, making friends, listening to music (https://stats.fm/quincytf2), playing badminton, and a lot more stuff that maybe you can see once I update my website. This semester I'm taking bachata and boxing. This is gonna be my first time teaching, and I’m super excited to meet you (and talk about anything non-CS related too!)

name: Samuel Hudson
details:
Hey-llo! I'm Sam, a sophomore studying Data Science and intending Business. I struggled through CS 61B last semester just like y'all are doing right now, but we made it out alive and I promise it's better on the other side. I'm here to help you out, and hopefully gain a better understanding of who you are and your goals so I can better structure our sections, and just connect on a personal level.

I love animation and film, so if you've got a favorite cartoon or a hot take on a Christopher Nolan movie I'd love to hear it. If you also are a fan of Kendrick Lamar, Chappell Roan, or Mitski (wow what a range), you are appreciated and ENCOURAGED to join my section!! Any Arcane fans, you are required to join my section.

Can't wait to meet y'all!

name: Sanay Bordia
details: Hi I'm Sanay, I'm a 2nd-year studying data science and economics (basic, ik). There is a non-zero chance you'll find me playing basketball, eating taco bell, exploring SF, working out, and watching Friends, The Office, or the Warriors. I love listening to Travis, the Weeknd, and Bollywood. Excited to meet yall!

name: Sanghun Byun
details: Hi, my name is Sanghun and I'm a junior studying CS and English. In my free time, I like to go hiking or hang out in cafes. I look forward to being your CS mentor!

name: Shinmu Jiang
details: Hi I'm Shinmu, a sophomore studying Econ and maybe DS. After retiring from pro RSF basketball, I've picked up a few cool tricks including losing 3v1s in Brawl Stars and winning with 7 deuce in poker.

name: Shriyaa Narayanan
details: Hi! I'm Shriyaa and I'm an EECS major! I've been an academic intern for CS 61B last semester and super excited to do CSM this semester! On campus other than CSM, I'm involved with AWE, RCSA, and CSM Tech! Outside of classes, I love to play tennis, swim, voice act, and dance so if you're ever interested in any of those, definitely feel free to reach out!

name: Vivek Putta
details: Hi I'm Vivek. A little about me I love to play bball, hit the gym, and read. You might catch me studying in random classrooms around campus. Let's have a great semester!

name: Alfonso Portilla
details: Hi! My name is Alfonso and I’m currently a junior studying EECS and Business. I’m an international student from Mexico City and my greatest hobby is playing the piano. I also love swimming and watching movies. Feel free to talk to me about anything you’d like. I’m excited to get to meet you and code together!

name: Dylan Chhum
details:
Hi Everyone, 
My name is Dylan Chhum. I am a transfer student and a senior EECS student. I am a co-instructor for the Cubstart decal (iOS), and director for Calhacks. Let me know if you want a spot at the hackathon! My home is in Orange County, but I do not go to Seaside Bakery every weekend. During the fall, I would spend every Sunday supporting my NFL team the Cardinals even though we do not win games. When I can I love Imm Thai, but you can find more often at Wingstop. Cannot wait to see you in my section, hope we have a fun semester together!

name: Hjalmar Levander
details: Hi my name is Hjalmar, I am a senior year EECS major. I transferred to Berkeley from Foothill College. When I’m not in school I’m most likely watching or playing soccer ⚽️.

name: Huijae An
details: Hi! I'm Huijae (pronounced hee-jay), a 2nd year EECS major. I like to think of myself as a computer architecture explorer, a hardcore UFC fan, and an awful fisher. Excited to meet you all!

name: Kat Cheng
details: My name is Kat, and I am a third year studying EECS ⚡️. 61C is my favorite CS class, and I hope you’ll end up loving it as much as I do! In my free time, I like to dance 💃🏻, perform in musicals 🎭, read novels 📚, and accumulate $7.50 charges at various boba places🧋.

name: Rian Puri
details:
Hey everyone! I'm Rian, a junior studying EECS.

I love playing basketball and skiing, and I’m always up for an adventure—whether it's exploring the outdoors or finding cool new spots around Berkeley.

When it comes to food, Imm Thai is definitely my go-to spot!

Looking forward to meeting you all and being part of this community! 🚀

name: Swathi Badrinarayanan
details: Hi, I'm Swathi, and I'm a second-year EECS major. Super excited to C (haha) all of you this semester! I love running, dance, and listening to music!

name: Teeron Hajebi
details: Hi, my name's Teeron and I'm a third year studying CS and applied math. Big fan of CS 61C

name: Will Coomans
details: I’m a junior from Long Beach, California. I am interested in software engineering and ML. I love skiing, guitar, and daniel caesar. My greatest strengths are word hunt and sleeping through classes.

name: Alex Um
details: old(er)

name: Rohan Bhagat
details: Hello! I'm Rohan, a sophomore from Fremont studying CS and Cognitive Science! I love teaching and I'm super excited to have a fun time this semester! :)

name: Vika Stukalova
details: I’m Vika and I’m a 4th year studying CS & DS! A fun fact about me is that this will be my 6th semester (and last 🥲) being a mentor for 70 💃 Some of my interests include ballet 🩰 & skiing ⛷️. If I had to choose a favorite artist I’d say it’s The Beatles! When I’m not debugging you can find me at the Fire Trails. I absolutely love teaching and cannot wait to teach you everything from proofs to probability :)

name: Crisostomo Dunn
details: Hi! Im Crisostomo(Cris), Im an undeclared sophomore. I was a 61A JM and reader for CS70 last semester, but this will be my first semester as a 70 JM. I like reading (2666!) and biking (Cal Tri!). Im here to help so reach out for whatever :)

name: Ethan Wang
details: Hi! I'm Ethan and I'm a sophomore from New Jersey studying statistics. In my free time, I like watching soccer, trying out new restaurants, and going on YouTube binges. I'm looking forward to meeting you all this semester!

name: Ira Dabke
details: Hi! I'm Ira, a sophomore studying CS and Stats. I like big dogs, iced coffee, game theory, Lizzie McAlpine, and learning weird instruments. Excited to meet you all!

name: Narah Quazi
details: Hi I'm Narah! I'm a junior studying CS and CogSci, with a minor in Linguistics. I'm from LA and I enjoy playing tennis, watching movies, and crocheting. My favorite artist is Lorde (please talk to me about Melodrama!!!). Excited to take an Eulerian tour and revisit CS70 as a mentor! :)

name: Jacob Shin
details: Hi, I’m Jacob Shin, a junior studying Computer Science. I’m a transfer student and an international student from South Korea. Outside of academics, I love playing soccer, ping pong, and all kinds of sports! I also enjoy exploring nature around the Berkeley campus. Looking forward to meeting you all!

name: Jai Sharma
details: Jai loves soccer (10>7), playing cards (poker), and music (from The Beatles to Joji). Sometimes, he also drinks boba, does Machine Learning projects, or goes for a walk. He has never tried coffee before.

name: Jefferson Li
details: Hi! I am Jefferson, a sophomore studying CS & Applied Math. In my free time, I like playing basketball, hiking, and watching F1 and NBA. Look forward to meeting you all!

name: Minqing Dong
details: Hi everyone! My name is Minqing, and I'm a freshman from the bay area. Outside of teaching, I enjoy playing games, hanging out with friends, and playing badminton. I'm excited to meet you all!

name: Pranav Bhatt
details: Hi, I'm Pranav! I'm a sophomore international student from the UK—no, I don’t eat beans on toast for every meal, but I won’t deny that it slaps—studying Applied Math at Berkeley. I'm passionate about quantum computing, AI, and problem-solving—whether it's in research, poker, or origami. I loved taking CS70, it was probably my favourite lower div class. I am excited to help you guys enjoy the course as much as I did. oh and PS — it’s called football, and no, I will never call it “soccer”—

name: Robert Meli
details: Hello everyone! My name is Robert Meli, and I'm a junior transfer studying EECS. Looking forward to meeting you all!

name: Sara
details: Hi all, I'm a sophomore and I'm really excited to teach CS 70 this semester! I’ve been enjoying diving into the material and can’t wait to share it with you all. I enjoy playing board games, watching sitcoms, and listening to music. Looking forward to working with you all this semester!

name: Varun Vemulapalli
details: Hey there! I’m Varun, a sophomore studying CS + DS. I spend my time thrifting, dancing, hooping, working out, snowboarding, watching movies, and chilling with friends. I especially listen to rap and R&B, but my music taste is pretty open, and I’m always down to grub at Toss. Excited to meet you all!

name: Caleigh Deyer
details: I love Simon & Garfunkel, the faces, lizzy mcalpine, and big thief. I love to bake and crochet in my free time! Look forward to treats in section :)

name: Esha Bansiya
details: Hi! My name is Esha and I am a freshman studying Data Science and Public Policy! I took Data 8 and C88C last semester and am now taking CS 61B! I enjoy reading books, though I haven’t had the chance in a while, playing cards with my friends, and trying new restaurants around campus!

name: Gautam Bhooma
details: Heya! My name is Gautam and I love games, hiking, and just hanging out. I am excited to teach you this semester!

name: Haoming Chen
details:
Hi I am Haoming, a freshman trying to double in CS and Math. I love rock music, soccer (Barcelona!), boardgames, hiking, science fiction. Talk to me about these topics and anything in between! 

Please don't hesitate to contact me if you felt lost/came into C88C without prior experience. I came into Berkeley with little prior experience in coding, but with the right help from CSM I managed to get A+ in C88C last semester, and I am very willing to share my experience!

name: Jaclyn Huynh
details: hey there :D! i’m jaclyn, a freshman from san jose studying data science. i’m a boba enthusiast and love solving escape rooms, playing val, and watching kdrama in my free time. looking forward to meeting you!

name: Jennie Bermudez
details: Hi! I’m in my fourth year as a Data Science major with a minor in City Planning. I truly love all types of music and always interested to hear new song recs! On my free time, I enjoy watching Adam Sandler movies or finding new cafes to study at. Looking forward to this semester with you all :)

name: Jonathan Yu
details: Hi! I'm Jonathan, a first-year student studying chemistry and CS! I'm an avid lover of public transit and all things laminated pastries--join me sometime for a SF croissant crawl :)

name: Khushboo Teotia
details: Hi! I am a third year majoring in Data Science, with a concentration in Comp. methods in Biology. My passion lies at the intersection of medicine and technology, which I harness through AI and healthcare research. Outside of academia, I love going on hikes, cafe-hopping (a huge coffee fan), trying out new food spots, and going on spontaneous trips with friends.

name: Liberty Lauer
details: Hi! I’m Liberty, a sophomore studying Data Science and Economics. In my free time, I enjoy playing tennis, painting, hiking, reading, and studying in cafes. I’m also a huge foodie, and I love traveling to new places. Looking forward to meeting and teaching you all this semester!

name: Nicolas Perez
details: My name is Nicolas and I am super to eager to be a part of the CSM community. I am deeply passionate about all things intersecting business, technology, and data. I love the outdoors, exploring new places and trying new foods, and supporting my favorite sports teams like the LA Lakers. My favorite restaurant in Berkeley would have to be Bag O’ Crab I recommend it.

name: Richard Li
details: Hi! My name is Richard and I'm a first-year intending to major in Data Science and Environmental Economics. In my free time I like to play soccer, basketball, and LinkedIn games!

name: Soumyadeep Talukdar
details: Hello! My name is Soumyadeep and I'm a neuroscience major and data science minor. My interests lie in synthetic biology and the brain, and I'm interested in how people can use computational tools to study these fields. In my free time, I enjoy going on hikes, exploring new places, and watching TV shows! I'm looking forward to mentoring CS 88 this semester!

name: Tanusha Kaushik
details: Hii my name is Tanusha and I am a sophomore studying Cognitive Science and Computer Science. Although it can be quite frustrating sometimes, I find computer science super cool and interesting most of the time and hope to help other people grow comfortable enough with it to feel the same. I am a big fan of the Pomodoro technique for studying. Ideally, I would fill my breaks with amazing music and food. I am an amazing Spotify stalker and have grown very attached to the Spotify jam feature. I also love exploring new restaurants and cafes in UCB--even if it's bad, at least I can use a new filter color to organize into my UCB campus notion page. Especially while in Berkeley, I've been wanting to go to more concerts. My all time favorite concerts have been the 1975, Kendrick Lamar & Baby Keem, and Sabrina Carpenter. I'm also going to a Zayn concert soon! I hope to see all the 1D boys' solo career concerts at least once.

name: Ty Snyder
details: Hi, I am Ty. I have been programming for the last 7 years. I enjoy building robots and have competed in multiple combat robotics events. I also worked as a BIM engineer for a year in which I helped design building HVAC and plumbing.

name: Tyler Jung
details: Hi nice to meet you, I'm Tyler! I'm a 2nd year studying Physics and Data Science from New York. Some things I like to do include skiing, watching sports, hitting the gym, and playing/listening to music. Some of my favorite artists include wave to earth, Knock2, DPR Live, and Tchaikovsky. I usually spend my Sunday's catching up on work, getting a good workout in, and hitting up a new restaurant. Speaking of restaurants, my favorite one in Berkeley is Butterfish Sushi. I am also part of Theta Tau Professional Engineering Fraternity and Big Data at Berkeley. Feel free to reach out to me @ tylerjung@berkeley.edu. Look forward to meeting everyone!

name: William Wu
details: Hey everyone! My name is William and I am currently majoring in Engineering Math & Statistics. In my free time, I enjoy playing basketball and strumming the guitar. I'm excited for a great semester with you all!

name: Maryam Akelyan
details: Hi! I'm Maryam, a sophomore majoring in Data Science and minoring in Armenian Studies, and I'm from La Crescenta, CA! In my free time I like to solve puzzles, listen to music, and watch sitcoms. So excited to meet everyone! :)

name: Alok Thakrar
details: hi! I’m alok, and I’m a freshman from santa babara, ca studying eecs. My hobbies include going to chipotle, discussing chipotle related matters, and daydreaming about chipotle. i’m super excited to be a CM (content mentor, not chipotle mentor sadly) this semester!

name: Justin Yang
details: I wake up in the morning I got EECS16A on my mind. DTFS, pseudoinverse, systems LTI. And all this matrix multiplying, I can't write out all these lines. But I can't let them do it I got EECS16A on my mind.

name: Avyukth Harish
details: I'm particularly interested in the intersection between machine learning and physics. Outside of academics, I’m a big sports fan. I enjoy playing basketball, table tennis, frisbee, and many more. My favorite restaurant, although lame, is Panda Express but I’m always willing to try new restaurants!

name: Jarrett Singh
details: Hi! My name is Jarrett and I'm a freshman in EECS. I love to spontaneously explore, go on long hikes, (eat a family sized Whole Foods tiramisu), and eat with friends!

name: Jennifer Ren
details: hi I’m Jen! I’m a freshman studying EECS. I’m interested in figure skating, Chinese dance and video games. I’m on a mission to find the best cake in Berkeley (so let me know your recs)!

name: Jonathan Loy
details: Hello :D My name is Jonathan and I'm a Nuclear Engineering major intending to double in EECS. I love playing music and am currently in the Cal Band and Wind Ensemble. I love having conversations about almost anything and enjoy hearing what others have to say.

name: Julia Mathew
details: Hi! I'm an EECS major from Sacramento, California. I love reading comics (like Peanuts and Calvin and Hobbes), watching sitcoms, and going on bike rides. I also enjoy eating at new restaurants (my favorite is Vik's Chaat) and going on small side quests. Outside of CSM, I am part of ML@B and SWE.

name: Sahir Tandon
details: Hi! I'm Sahir, a first-year EECS major (intended double in Physics), and I took 16A last semester. I love hiking, rock climbing, and exploring outdoors - touching grass! When I'm inside, I procrastinate with puzzles and origami. I'm also in CHAOS, the Intermission Orchestra, and Codeology.

name: Sean Li
details: Hey! I'm Sean and I'm a Freshman from the Bay Area. I love learning, teaching, and meeting new people. I'm on the Club Baseball team here at Cal, and I enjoy  watching all sports. I also like playing the piano, poker, and working out. I can't wait to meet everyone!

name: SooHyuk Cho
details: Hi all! I’m SooHyuk, a senior double majoring CS and DS from Seoul, South Korea. I'm a advisor and 16A SM advisor this semester :) I like playing the piano in my free time unless I’m stuck in the library lol. Any recommendations for classical or new age piano pieces are always welcome!

name: Cecilia Sanjaya
details: Hey everyone! My name is Cecilia and I am a second year majoring in EECS. I’m from Indonesia but I moved to Irvine, CA in 6th grade. My hobbies include exploring new things and places, making new friends, doing adrenaline activities, going to concerts, riding my motorcycle and  many more. I’m so excited to be in CSM this semester!

name: Cody Wang
details: I am a sophomore EECS major from Atlanta, Georgia. I spend much of my time in the RSF weight room, so if you go in the afternoon we've probably crossed paths. 16B was my favorite class experience at Berkeley thus far, and I'm looking forward to helping create a similar experience for others if I can.

name: Jordan Velasco
details: Hello! I'm Jordan and I'm a second-year studying EECS from Riverbank, CA. I like listening to indie music, drinking matcha, and playing video games during my free time. I am excited to be able to teach and help others. Feel free to reach out if you have any questions or need any help!

name: Kevin He
details:
Hi! I'm Kevin and I'm a sophomore Engineering Physics major. I'm interested in micro-fabrication and device manufacturing, so I'll probably qualify for an EECS minor along the way. 
I grew up in Santa Barbara (a very chill tourist city 2 hours north of LA) and I attended a diverse and not-too-intense high school. Although I played tennis in high school, I enjoy rock-climbing more now and playing music with others (if you ever go to a UCBSO concert you'll see me in the first violins!). I actually don't listen to that much classical music though, instead it's mainly R&B artists such as d4vid, Daniel Caeser, and Sarah Kang, and also Christian worship artists. I spend much of my weekend time with my Christian fellowship: Crossroads (yes the same as the dining hall), but otherwise, I'll be catching up on sleep. 

Fun fact: My sleep schedule last semester was consistently sleeping from 5-7am to waking up after the sun had gone down. But! After failing the final and getting a B in Quantum Mechanics, I made the resolution to have a semi-regular sleep schedule going forward.

I hope this little introduction has allowed you to get to know me a little bit, and if we end up in the same section, I'll be looking forward to learning more about you too!

name: Nandan Diwan
details:
Hi all,

I'm Nandan Diwan, a freshman studying Engineering Physics. I'm particularly interested in how physics can be used to model and develop novel electronic devices. 

I enjoy drinking coffee, playing cards with my friends, and hiking.

name: William Jung
details: Hi, I’m William, a sophomore majoring in EECS. I enjoy working out, traveling, and spending time with friends. On weekends, I like to go out, explore restaurants near Oakland, and grab coffee. Always looking for new experiences and great to meet you all.

name: Anish Shrestha
details: Hey, I’m Anish! I’m a sophomore, and this is my second semester teaching 61C with CSM. I love Ultimate Frisbee, rock climbing, and just vibing. I’m usually listening to indie or indie rock. Can’t wait to meet you all!

name: Chrystopher Thomas
details: Hello! I'm Chrys! I'll be your AM this semester. I'm currently obsessed with Poppy Playtime (Chapter 4), playing guitar, and teaching computers to solve puzzles. Feel free to reach out if you like those things too!

name: Majed AlFaraj
details: Hey everyone! I'm a second-year EECS student. Currently, 6lack and Frank Ocean are my favourite artists. During my free time, I enjoy playing board/card games with my friends—especially Jackaroo. You may randomly find me doing the Origins easter egg solo on black ops 2. Excited to meet you all!

name: Sophia Carazo-Ortiz
details: Hi!! My name is Sophia Carazo and I am a sophomore studying EECS. This will be my second semester mentoring for 61A and I am super excited to mentor again!!! Outside of CSM, I am involved with Codebase. When I am not locked in you can find me watching horror movies, cooking, or spending time with friends.

name: Vivien Goyal
details: I'm a senior (CS & Math) interested in CS theory, sci-fi and fantasy, and the intersection of the two (it exists and it's glorious). I'm also fond of programming languages, tabletop RPGs, and lemonade (and all combinations of those elements). Looking forward to teaching you all a bunch of really neat math!
